New Records: Rohit Sharma broke the record for the fastest 50 balls in a T20I with 92 runs in 41 balls
Rohit Sharma also became the first player to score 200 runs in a single innings in a T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma's dismissal of Mitchell Starc in a 29-run over
Axar Patel's sensational catch to dismiss Mitchell Marsh
Kuldeep Yadav's googly dismissing Glenn Maxwell
Post-Match Reflections: Manjrekar praised Rohit Sharma's selflessness and leadership
The victory was seen as a pivotal moment for India's tournament journey
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in St Lucia, with a sunny morning
Weather conditions affected the match play
